document.full_text: kevin durant scored 26 points, james harden led an outburst by oklahoma city's bench with 21, and the thunder evened their series with memphis by beating the grizzlies on tuesday night.
document.title: thunder 111, grizzlies 102: thunder tie series with grizzlies with 111-102 win
lines_and_colors: kevin durant scored 26 points, james harden led an outburst by oklahoma city's bench with 21, and the thunder evened their series with memphis by beating the grizzlies on tuesday night.
